values.name: Red Cross
values.desc: The American Red Cross, also known as the American National Red Cross, is a humanitarian organization that provides emergency assistance, disaster relief and education in the United States.

values.name: Hope For Haiti
values.desc: We work to improve the quality of life for the Haitian people, particularly children.

values.name: Feeding America
values.desc: Feeding America is a hunger organization with a nationwide network of food banks feeding the hungry.

values.name: Salvation Army
values.desc: The Salvation Army is a Christian church and international charitable organisation structured in a quasi-military fashion.
